summary: As Magdalena's 15th birthday approaches, her simple, blissful life is complicated by the discovery that she's pregnant. Kicked out of her house, she finds a new family with her great-granduncle and gay cousin.
cast: Jesus Castanos|Araceli Guzman-Rico|Emily Rios|J.R. Cruz|Listette Avila|Alicia Sixtos|Hector Quevedo|Germán Campos|Carlos Linares|Johnny Chavez|Carmen Aguirre|Margarita Lugo|Jorge Ortiz|Veronica Sixtos|Jesse Garcia|Valentin Martinez Medina|Alicia Flamenco|Bertha Flamenco|George Ortiz|Jasiel Flamenco|Chalo González|Alexandra Escamilla|Marlene Flamenco|Frankie Loyal|Aris Mendoza|Rebecca López|Alex Sanchez|David W. title: Quinceañera: Echo Park
